participant_1.background:
I enjoy reading about cycling because of my family's passion for it.
my daughter just graduated college.
i have 4 pets.
i use to be a huge superman fan as a child.
my favorite food is tacos.

participant_2.background:
I try my best to eat well and get enough sleep, but I'm not always perfect.
I have two personalities, one that is nice to my family and one that is not so nice to others.
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
I found a romance novel that my girlfriend would love, but I'm afraid to tell her about it.
i am not really a blond.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of cycling. How about you?
Oh, that's cool! I've been trying to get into it more lately.
Nice! Do you have a bike?
Yeah, I just got one this summer.
That's awesome! How do you like it so far?
It's great! I've been going on a lot of rides with my friends.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're enjoying it.
Thanks! I'm thinking about doing a bike tour this summer.
That's a great idea! I've always wanted to do one.
Maybe we can do it together!
Awesome! We'll have to plan it out.
